title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1666/93 of 29 June 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2191/81 on the granting of aid for the purchase of butter by non-profit-making institutions and organizations
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1666/93 of 29 June 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2191/81 on the granting of aid for the purchase of butter by non-profit-making institutions and orgnizations
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 2 of Regulation (EEC) No 2191/81, 'ECU 149,74' hereby replaced by 'ECU 138'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 July 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
